headline: 4 Retail Stocks to Buy as Consumer Confidence Continues to Rise
summary: Improvement in consumer sentiment is an encouraging sign for retailers. SFM, DECK, CHWY and CURV are poised to gain from increased consumer spending activity.

headline: Nordstrom Q3 Earnings Beat, Rack Banner Sales Increase 10.6% Y/Y
summary: JWN posts solid third-quarter fiscal 2024 results. Sales at the Nordstrom Rack banner increase 10.6% year over year.

headline: DKS Beats on Q3 Earnings on Strong Back-to-School Season, Ups '24 View
summary: DICK'S Q3 results reflect gains from a strong back-to-school shopping season and robust comparable sales, leading to a raised full-year guidance.

raw.headline: DKS Beats on Q3 Earnings on Strong Back-to-School Season, Ups '24 View

headline: These brands have the 'newness' that shoppers want: Retail analyst
summary: With the holiday season here, retail earnings are taking center stage as investors pay close attention to performance heading into the key shopping period.Telsey Advisory Group CEO and Chief Research Officer Dana Telsey joins Morning Brief co-hosts Seana Smith and Brad Smith to share her outlook for the holiday shopping season and retail trends, including which brands are best positioned to thrive.“Innovation and value is what works,” Telsey explained, pointing to companies like Birkenstock (BIRK), Ralph Lauren (RL), and Deckers Outdoor (DECK) as top performers, offering products that appeal to wider age groups.To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief here. This post was written by Cindy Mizaku.

headline: Abercrombie Q3 Earnings & Sales Beat: What's Behind the 5% Stock Dip?
summary: ANF's Q3 results reflect gains from substantial growth across regions and brands. Optimism for the holiday season prompts an upward revision of its FY24 outlook.

headline: Urban Outfitters' Q3 Earnings Beat Estimates, Wholesale Sales Rise Y/Y
summary: URBN's Q3 results show year-over-year growth in both earnings and revenues, driven by the company's strategic efforts to enhance customer engagement.
